funding-group.funding-statement: This work was co-funded by the European Regional Development Fund and the Republic of Cyprus through the Research Promotion Foundation (Project ΥΓΕΙΑ/ΔΥΓΕΙΑ/0311(BIE)/13). KE would like to acknowledge the European Union Scholarship Programme for the Turkish Cypriot Community for financial support. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
